org.trianacode.annotation

Annotation Type Tool


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Tool
    Annotation that should be applied to a class wanting to be wrapped as a Tool This annotation should be applied to the class definition. In addition, a Process annotation should be applied to the method that should be invoked during workflow execution.

    Currently display name and package are ignored. This is because too little is known about a tool when it is first rendered.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String displayName 
      java.lang.String displayPackage 
      int minimumInputs 
      int minimumOutputs 
      OutputPolicy outputPolicy 
      java.lang.String panelClass 
      java.lang.String[] renderingHints
